text: Børge Ring (17 February 1921 – 27 December 2018) was a Danish screenwriter, director and animator. His 1978 short movie Oh My Darling won the Best Short Film award at the 1978 Cannes Film Festival, and his 1984 short movie Anna & Bella won the Best Animated Short Film award at the Academy Awards. Ring died on 28 December 2018 in Ravenstein, Netherlands at the age of 97. ==References== Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:Animators Category:Danish screenwriters Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Danish movie directors
